overview: EVERYONE HAS A DATING EXPERIENCE! Some are good; some are bad and some a bit ugly. From first dates with crazy and creative ways Mormons ask each other out, to engagement, to marriage, to the challenges of divorce or of never being married. Members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints share their real life experience both hilarious or heartfelt in the pursuit of finding that special someone
title: The Real Life Singles Ward
